game.title: The Lost Artifact
game.objective: Find and return the ancient artifact to the museum.
game.description: In a forgotten temple deep in the jungle, an invaluable artifact has been reported missing. Your mission is to locate it and bring it back to the museum for safekeeping.

task.objective: Locate the entrance to the temple
task.description: You need to discover the hidden entrance among the dense vegetation.
task.location: Jungle clearing, west of the village

task.description: The temple is filled with dangerous traps and riddles. Overcome them to reach the artifact.
